title: STILL NO FIX FOR THOSE WHO CANNOT CONNECT TO GAMES AFTER CHAMP SELECT
body: Here we are, over a year later from the post linked ( http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/cEZpxr99-fed-up-cant-connect-after-champion-select ) specifically with no fix for this issue. How is that even possible? I cannot connect to a game until it is more then a minute in and even then i cant connect to 75% of them. This is rediculous

replies.body: Do you experience connectivity issues anywhere else, such as connecting to a Hotmail account, accessing Windows Updates or any other games?

This issue can be caused by a ton of potential causes, however, it is most often caused by an unstable connection to the servers. This would also explain why your issue is intermittent and not a constant problem. A good place to start in troubleshooting this would be to work through our [Connection Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), as it goes over the most common fixes. 

Let me know if you still see this issue after working through those steps.

when i do connect to the game i have around 28 ping, and I had already done everything on the guide...
{{item:3070}}
Are you still experiencing issues connecting to matches then?
